name: The Zeta Halo Experience - Desert Biome
name_original: The Zeta Halo Experience - Desert Biome
description:
It's as simple as click download, wait & play! (4GB)

I hope you all enjoy this FAN-MADE Zeta Halo Experience. 
*Not Official Halo content*
---------------------------------------------
The story behind the level: In an undisclosed location on Zeta Halo, Chief has been sent to search the ring spine now visible due to the rings destruction in hopes of discovering about this ancient alien tech... This is my first of many fully explorable levels & I'm excited to put it in your hands! 
---------------------------------------------
The level was created by me, INFINITE FORGES.
The music is done by:  https://twitter.com/MitchellRBroom
The tech art is done by: https://twitter.com/gearshift_media
The Forerunner models where made by: https://twitter.com/spartan0398  
---------------------------------------------
If you enjoyed this Zeta Halo experience & would like to support the channel, become a patreon! Click here: https://www.patreon.com/infiniteforges  - https://twitter.com/Infiniteforges

Leave a comment below! I'd love to hear your thoughts. All the best.
Thank you for downloading!
